arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: West Ham United host Burnley on Saturday in their first home match since securing a vital 3-1 win over Newcastle United. That victory was their first of the season at the London Stadium. It also ended a damaging six-game winless run. arts.ttl: Burnley XI vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Burnley travel to the London Stadium today for a crucial six-pointer against 18th-placed West Ham United. The Clarets currently sit just one place above their opponents. Therefore, a victory would provide a significant boost to their hopes for survival. arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Burnley – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United are aiming for back-to-back Premier League wins for the first time since February. They host Burnley today in a crucial battle at the foot of the table.
